This package contains some approximate implementations of the original Pac-Man AIs.

  • Uses of Unit in nl.tudelft.jpacman.board

    Methods in nl.tudelft.jpacman.board that return types with arguments of type Unit
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Unit>
    Square.getOccupants()
    Returns an immutable list of units occupying this square, in the order in which they occupied this square (i.e. oldest first.)

    <C1 extends Unit, C2 extends Unit>
    void
    CollisionInteractionMap.onCollision(Class<C1> collider, Class<C2> collidee, CollisionInteractionMap.CollisionHandler<C1,C2> handler)
    Adds a two-way collision interaction to this collection, i.e. the collision handler will be used for both C1 versus C2 and C2 versus C1.

    Adds a two-way collision interaction to this collection, i.e. the collision handler will be used for both C1 versus C2 and C2 versus C1.
